namespace  IOP

Detailed Description

Pre-compiled IDL source for the IOP module.

IOP.pidl,v 1.13 2002/02/08 01:07:32 coryan Exp

This file is used to generate IOPC.{h,i,cpp}, using the following command:

tao_idl.exe -o orig -Gp -Gd -Ge 1 -Gv -Wb,export_macro=TAO_Export -Wb,export_include=TAO_Export.h -Wb,pre_include="ace/pre.h" -Wb,post_include="ace/post.h" IOP.pidl

and then:

cp orig/IOPC.{h,i,cpp} . patch < diffs/IOP.diff

The code left in IOPC.{h,i,cpp} is ready for use.

Generated on Wed Jan 15 19:56:13 2003 for TAO by 1.2.13.1 written by Dimitri van Heesch, © 1997-2001
